QuestData.Title: Shalassic Park
QuestData.Description: We have a Devilsaur.$b$bI think she sees you as the pack leader now. She should obey your commands.$b$bShe looks hungry. Why don't you let her off the leash a little bit?
QuestData.RewardText: That was quite the spectacle, $n.$b$bSu'esh will be a valuable ally in the days to come. I will keep an eye on her for the time being.
